text: Amalebra (, the name means from the clay of the river Amal) is a hamlet in Cornwall, England, United Kingdom, 3 miles (5 kilometres) south-west of St Ives at Ordnance Survey .Ordnance Survey 1:25000 scale 'Explorer' map, sheet 102Ordnance Survey: Landranger map sheet 203 Land's End The 2011 census population data was included with the civil parish of Towednack. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Hamlets in Cornwall
title: Amalebra
